name: NOTHING BUT NAKED
description:
Last night you and your friends had the most epic university party in your life… or at least that’s what you think, as you don’t remember anything. All of you awake in the university with nothing…, literally, not even with clothes…

Your objective: Find the way out of the university!

Take control of the 3 friends, and use them to help each other to sneak out of their embarassing situation.

But watch out! No one will like to see you naked, and the janitors… not even with clothes, so stay away of them!!!

Game made for the Ludum Dare 45.
